creator: jimes@hiwaay.net
text:
The .rpm install for ant-1.4.1 from 

http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/jakarta-ant/release/v1.4.1/

puts most documentation in /usr/doc/ant-manual-1.4.1, but the javadocs (from 
the ant-javadoc package) land in /usr/share/javadoc/ant, so when you click on 
the "Ant API" in the left frame of the user manual main page, it's not found.

I resolved the issue with this symbolic link on my own machine:

ln -s /usr/share/javadoc/ant /usr/doc/ant-manual-1.4.1/api

Could that link be included in the ant-javadoc .rpm?

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: Could you take care of this, Henri?
Will be fixed in next rpm (may be the .3) release.
creator: hgomez@slib.fr
conor@apache.org
text:
I would think this has been superseded by the 1.5.1 release which has a new set
of RPMS. Can you reopen if there is a problem in the 1.5.1 RPMs

I'm amrking as FIXED in anticipation.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: we no longer provide RPMs, so it is time to close the component as it only causes confusion.
